info.name: Video converter (TEST PFE CLEMENT)
info.summary: Convert videos within the web interface
info.description:
Convert videos within the web interface
* **Features:** * Video Conversion * Optionally overwrites files * Preset option * More to come...
* **Requirements:** * FFmpeg
* **Note:** * Does not currently support conversion with encryption enabled * More formats will be added soon
info.author: PFE (Clement DEFFES)
